title: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
short_description:
Spaghetti Aglio e Olio is a traditional Italian pasta dish from Naples, featuring spaghetti, garlic, olive oil, red chili flakes, and parsley for a simple yet rich flavor. 
• 400g spaghetti 
• 6 tablespoons olive oil 
• 4 cloves garlic, minced 
• 1 teaspoon red chili flakes 
• Fresh parsley, chopped

steps.title: Cook Pasta
steps.description:
• Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. 
• Add 400g of spaghetti and cook until al dente, about 8-10 minutes. 
• Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining.

steps.title: Prepare Garlic Oil
steps.description:
• Heat 6 tablespoons of olive oil in a large skillet. 
• Add 4 minced garlic cloves and 1 teaspoon of red chili flakes. 
• Cook on low heat until the garlic is golden brown.

steps.title: Combine and Serve
steps.description:
• Add the drained spaghetti to the skillet with garlic oil. 
• Toss well to coat, adding reserved pasta water as needed to moisten. 
• Garnish with chopped parsley and serve immediately.
